attributes.action: Request the king dissolves government to trigger a general election
attributes.additional_details: This petition needs to be actioned or the country will spiral even further in to civil unrest and lower living standards and poverty,
attributes.background: With the country in such a state and the government refusing to solve and sometimes discuss many issue like the many striking industries and the dire state of the NHS, we have minister running departments that they have no prior experience with, showing how incompetent and out of their depth the are

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions which call for actions with regard to specific individuals, including His Majesty the King, but we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Call an immediate general election to end the chaos of the current government: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
